name: Prepare The Ground 2026
description:
A community-led arts and heavy music festival, the first of its kind in the city! 

Founded by two lifelong friends, Toronto-based concert promoter Denholm Whale and KW Campol of music management company Mythos and the Perpetual Flame Ministries record label/art house. 

Drawing inspiration from European festival stalwarts like Roadburn, Supersonic, and Amplifest, we're focused on heavy music as an ethos of collective catharsis more than a dedication to one specific metal subgenre. From burgeoning artists, to favorites you never thought would reunite, to one-off full album sets, a heavily curated and meticulously planned lineup is the festival's key component.
